title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 84.4 - Maximum mortgage loan for certain mortgagees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 84.4 - Maximum mortgage loan for certain mortgagees

State Regulations

No bank or trust company shall make a mortgage loan in an
amount in excess of 15 per centum of the capital stock, surplus fund and
undivided profits of such bank or trust company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
84.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
